markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 463 <sup>2.0</sup>

A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.
name: Visual
